Instance.description: Interaction that allows a player to pick a Gig from generated picker panel. Once selected, the Gig will be added to the Sim's career and scheduled.

TunableVariant.name: buckets
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, we only return Gigs from these buckets. Gigs with no buckets are rejected. The order in which buckets are tuned here will determine the order in which buckets are shown in the picker. Gigs from the first bucket will appear at the top of the picker and so on.

Tunable.name: disable_row_if_visibility_tests_fail
Tunable.display: Disable Row If Visibility Tests Fail
Tunable.description: If checked, we will grey out any row if the corresponding gig failed its visibility testing. If not checked, the row won't be shown.

Tunable.name: gig_career
Tunable.description: The Gig Career associated with this interaction.

TunableVariant.name: loot_when_empty
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, we run this loot when picker is empty and don't display the empty picker. If disabled, picker will appear empty.

TunableList.name: enabled
TunableList.description: Loot applied if the picker is going to be empty.

Tunable.name: run_visibility_tests
Tunable.description: If checked, This picker will run visibility tests on a gig to decide whether it should be shown. Otherwise, all gigs will be available.
